name: Alfred E. TILLINGHAST et al. v. Robert W. HAWKSLEY et al.; William H. HOOD et al. v. Robert W. HAWKSLEY et al.

parties: Alfred E. TILLINGHAST et al. v. Robert W. HAWKSLEY et al. William H. HOOD et al. v. Robert W. HAWKSLEY et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
SHEA, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Abedon, Michaelson, Stanzler, Biener, Skolnik & Lipsey, Milton Stanzler, Providence, for petitioners.
Edwards & Angelí, Robert Flanders, Providence, Lewis Z. Lavine, Woonsocket, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
Alfred E. TILLINGHAST et al. v. Robert W. HAWKSLEY et al. William H. HOOD et al. v. Robert W. HAWKSLEY et al.
No. 81-566-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
March 18, 1982.
Abedon, Michaelson, Stanzler, Biener, Skolnik & Lipsey, Milton Stanzler, Providence, for petitioners.
Edwards & Angelí, Robert Flanders, Providence, Lewis Z. Lavine, Woonsocket, for respondents.
